name: Cyber Setting
description:
This is a classic Sci-Fi side-scrolling shooter with a mix of retro styles in it. Enjoy the play and experience the flash out of the good old days. Why not kill the minions and kick out the Boss's ass. Let the world get peace. A piece what it deserves!

Successfully designed, created and built in a day. (17 hrs) A complete set of retro mixed Sci-Fi platformer shooter you all deserve to play and experience the double fun.
